Thanks.  I will be revising the story slightly because I had wanted 
to use more stronger terms.  After revising and catching typos like 
cloth/clothe (^_^) I will upload it to SHQ.com in the fanfic section 
and delete the rough draft in the "Files" section here

secretarytocapt3
